regen.absent_element: specification for handling conflicts between manual and scheduled settings
regen.new_specification: The system shall prioritize scheduled settings over manual settings and notify the user of any conflicts or overrides.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
